name: Publish content from Airtable to Webflow

base.label: Content Blog with Webflow and OpenAI GPT

spec.help: Valid URL with Image extension in it.
spec.name: url
spec.label: URL

spec.help: Must be alphanumerical and not contain any spaces or special characters
spec.name: slug
spec.label: Slug

spec.help:
Please note that if you want to set your item as "Draft", then you also need to select **No** in "Live" below.
Also note that setting the item as "Draft" will unpublish your item from live site (this is a native behavior of Webflow API).
spec.name: _draft
spec.label: Draft
